TEXT: ~[#FF8C00]FRUSTRATION~ NL NL #r"FOR #rYOUR #rCRIMES #rAGAINST #rTHE #rNATURAL #rORDER, #rYOU #rARE #rHEREBY #rBANISHED #rFROM #rTHE #rREALM!" NL NL As the doors close, you still fail to understand why.  As it is, they are all going to die to the #ySpire and its #yBlight. Desperate times call for desperate measures. And not only did they refuse to help you, they #r@EXILED@ you! NL NL A few days later, you regain your resolve.  You're determined that the power from your deals will not be wasted, even if no one will ever appreciate you for it.
Enables the Exile extended heart kill cutscene.
Activated relics have an effect that occurs when you click their button next to your energy orb.
Potions that can only be obtained through events.
NL Enemy loses !X1! HP at the start of its turns.
Choose Any Number of Cards to Replace (Blessed Necklace)
